name: Burg_113
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues-influenced dialect with loanwords for navigation
ritual offerings to tides before departure
diet heavy on salted fish, pickled seaweeds and reagent-spiced stews
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or long-range mind control
limited combustion industry (no high-pressure steam megatech)
notes: location/status within state unclear; functions as local coastal relay
seasonal navigation and augury important to schedules
